inclusion.criterion: Patient with a diagnosed Cushing's disease according to the French "protocole national de diagnostic et de soins (PNDS)"
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patient who underwent a MRI pituitary for diagnostic purposes
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient who have undergone catheterization of the lower petrosal sinuses (if MRI does not detect pituitary adenoma) and have a result in favor of a central secretion of ACTH
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patient having an indication of surgical excision of the adenoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient with a micro-adenoma (less than 1 cm in diameter) if the tumor is visualized on MRI
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patient for which informed and written consent to participate has been obtained.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with a pituitary macro-adenoma with visual impairment
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with ACTH-dependent Cushing's syndrome secondary to ectopic ACTH secretion
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with recurrence and / or history of pituitary adenoma excision
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with a contraindication to pituitary surgery or general anesthesia
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a known case of Acromegaly who underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. He has an IGF-1 level of 4.5 ULN adjusted by sex and age, and his random GH level is 4 ug/L.
